DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study determine safety efficacy investigational product ( IHBG-10 ) weight loss , change body composition .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Evaluate Effect Investigational Product Weight Loss Body Composition
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects randomize one two group : one group take 500 mg investigational product ( IHBG-10 ) 15 minute prior three main meal day ; group take placebo 15 minute prior three main meal day . Subjects investigational product placebo 12 week . Participation study involve four study visit .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Body mass index 30 great Agree keep diet , exercise current health habit stable participation study Women pregnant , breastfeed plan become pregnant Prior bariatric surgery Use prescription overthecounter appetite suppressant , herbal product medication weight loss within past month Obesity result clinically diagnose endocrine problem Currently take antipsychotic medication History peptic ulcer disease
